sentences.sContent: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.sContent_eng: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.sCn: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

phrases.pCn: 无足轻重的人；不重要的

words.tran: 油炸的，油煎的；喝醉了的
可供油炸的食品；油炸锅；做油煎食品的人

trans.tranOther: the young of various species of fish
to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil
